description.text: You can do more with your blade than slash and stab.

sections.Benefit: Choose one of the following combat maneuvers: disarm, reposition, steal, sunder, or trip. You gain a +2 bonus when performing the selected maneuver while wielding a dueling sword. This bonus does not stack with the bonus provided by a combat maneuver feat with -improved- in its name (such as Improved Trip).
sections.Special: You can select this feat multiple times, choosing a different combat maneuver each time.
